DOC.brief_summary: During the stand phase the DMD foot is too plantarflexed in addition patients adopt a higher flexion and abduction of the hip in order to advance the swinging limb. The aim of this work is to assess the immediate contribution of heels for these walking disturbance in children with muscular dystrophy disease.
DOC.brief_title: The Contribution of Heels for Walking Quality Among Children With Muscular Dystrophy
DOC.criteria: age >6 yrs walk without heel strike cannot understand simple instructions
